channel.title: Moxie Marlinspike on Nicola Iarocci
channel.description: Recent content in Moxie Marlinspike on Nicola Iarocci
channel.copyright: Produced / Written / Maintained by Nicola Iarocci since 2010

item.title: Quoting Moxie Marlinspike
item.description: It’s very fast to build something that’s 90% of a solution. The problem is that the last 10% of building something is usually the hard part which really matters, and with a black box at the center of the product, it feels much more difficult to me to nail that remaining 10%. Closing that gap with gen AI feels much more fickle to me than a normal engineering problem. It could be that I’m unfamiliar with it, but I also wonder if some classes of generative AI based products are just doomed to mediocrity as a result.
item.content:encoded:
It’s very fast to build something that’s 90% of a solution. The problem is that the last 10% of building something is usually the hard part which really matters, and with a black box at the center of the product, it feels much more difficult to me to nail that remaining 10%. Closing that gap with gen AI feels much more fickle to me than a normal engineering problem. It could be that I’m unfamiliar with it, but I also wonder if some classes of generative AI based products are just doomed to mediocrity as a result.

– Moxie Marlinspike
